properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 29 at 3:17AM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph
possible.

* WHERE...Eastern Glacier.

* WHEN...An initial round of strong winds are possible Friday
afternoon. The strongest winds may then be found Friday night
through Saturday evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds may blow down limbs, trees, and power
lines. A few local power outages are possible. Travel may
become difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and dry conditions may bring
some increased grassland fire danger Friday through Saturday.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
